creator: Coinmotion Oy
descriptionHtml:
We’re one of the leading cryptocurrency service providers in Europe with users in over 20 countries in Europe. With Coinmotion you can securely store and trade Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, XRP and Stellar Lumens in an user-friendly app and web platform.

Here’s some of our most popular features:

REGULATED OPERATOR

Coinmotion is run by a Finnish company Prasos Ltd. We have been offering cryptocurrency services since 2012. Prasos Ltd has a payment institution license and is a regulated provider of cryptocurrency services authorised by the Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority FIN-FSA.

FAST AND EASY BUYING OF CRYPTOCURRENCIES

Get cryptocurrencies in an instant. Buying all of our offered cryptocurrencies is simple and fast. All you need to do is make a deposit using one of the accepted payment methods and you can start investing in cryptocurrencies.

CHECK WALLET BALANCES AND FOLLOW THE MARKETS

Access your cryptocurrency balances and follow the market development within the app easily.

SUPPORTED CRYPTOCURRENCIES

You can choose from a selection of the most popular cryptocurrencies. Currently we offer Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) and Stellar Lumens (XLM). More cryptocurrencies will be added to the platform in the future.
descriptionShort: Easy way to buy, sell and manage your cryptocurrency

title: Coinmotion

creator: Coinmotion Oy
descriptionHtml:
Start growing your wealth in crypto. Invest easily in Bitcoin —plus 8 other promising cryptos— then use our services to earn interest, borrow, and spend in crypto. Beginner or not — getting started takes 10 minutes.

WHAT IS COINMOTION
Coinmotion is the easiest and safest way to invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies. More than 130.000 clients in Europe love Coinmotion for being the most secure place to grow and store their wealth in crypto. You can invest through the mobile wallet, web app, or ask our Private Banking advisors to execute OTC trades for you.

With Coinmotion you can:
• Buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies with a credit or debit card*, Klarna, online banking, bank transfer, and Sofort*. It takes less than 10 minutes to get started.
• Earn up to 5.5% interest per year on your investments.
• Spend your crypto in 30M locations around the world with the Coinmotion Debit Card.*
• Set up a savings account to automate your investments every month.

SECURE CRYPTO WALLET
We have been securely storing our clients' funds since 2012. Our clients’ crypto funds are secured with multi-sig offline cold storage, and the euro funds are stored on a segregated custody account provided by Aktia Bank in Finland. Our employees follow the strictest security guidelines, and we recommend you to use secure passwords with two-factor authentication.

FINANCIALLY REGULATED
Coinmotion Oy is a registered virtual currency service provider and licensed payment institution regulated by the Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority (Ref: FIVA 36/02.02.00/2018).

EASILY BUY BITCOIN & CRYPTO
Investing with Coinmotion takes less than 10 minutes, even if you're new to crypto. There are 5 ways to buy Bitcoin: credit or debit card*, bank transfer, Klarna, online banking, and Sofort transfer*.

EARN INTEREST, GET LOANS, AND SPEND IN CRYPTO
Earn up to 5.5% interest per year. Deposit your crypto, and get a loan in euros. Spend your crypto with the Coinmotion Card in more than 30M locations around the world.

SUPPORTED CRYPTOCURRENCIES
Invest in Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Stellar Lumens (XLM), Aave (AAVE), Chainlink (LINK), Uniswap (UNI), and USD Coin (USDC).

PRIVATE BANKING AND WEALTH MANAGEMENT
We reward our most loyal clients with benefits like:
• Discounted fees
• Customized interest-earning products
• Dedicated Private Banking Advisor
• Access to market insights and reports
• Tax and balance reporting
• OTC trading of hundreds of additional tokens**

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you need help, contact our Help Center or call our Customer Support at +358 600 30088.

* Currently available only through the web app
** Available only through our Private Banking advisors
descriptionShort: Easiest way to buy, sell, and earn with your cryptocurrency

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: View your portfolio’s all-time value change & 24h value change of each crypto you own. Generate multiple addresses for receiving crypto. Enjoy the app with improved performance and fixed bugs.

WHAT IS COINMOTION
Coinmotion is the easiest and safest way to invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies. You can invest through the mobile wallet, web app, or ask our Private Banking advisors to execute OTC trades for you.

With Coinmotion you can:
• Buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies with a credit or debit card*, Klarna, online banking, bank transfer, and Sofort*. It takes less than 10 minutes to get started.
• Earn up to 5.5% interest per year on your investments.
• Spend your crypto in 30M locations around the world with the Coinmotion Debit Card.*
• Set up a savings account to automate your investments every month.

SECURE CRYPTO WALLET

Our clients’ crypto funds are secured with multi-sig offline cold storage, and the euro funds are stored on a segregated custody account provided by Aktia Bank in Finland. creator: Coinmotion Oy
descriptionHtml:
Crypto investing made easy and safe with Coinmotion. Join over 180,000 users who trust our secure, Finnish platform to invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other promising cryptocurrencies.

WHY COINMOTION?
• Easiest & safest: Our user-friendly mobile app, BankID authentication, and integrations with Nordic banks ensure a smooth and secure investment experience.
• Trusted by over 180,000 Finnish and Swedish users: We are one of Europe’s cryptocurrency pioneers, having started operations in 2012. We operate under the regulation of the Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority and adhere to the highest security standards.

KEY FEATURES
• Buy Bitcoin & more: Purchase Bitcoin, Ethereum, and 200 other cryptocurrencies using credit/debit cards, instant online banking, or SEPA bank transfers in just minutes.
• Automated savings: Automate monthly investments and grow your crypto portfolio effortlessly.
• Secure storage: Your assets are protected with multi-signature offline cold storage and segregated euro custody accounts.
• Extensive support: Access our dedicated Help Center or call our Customer Support for assistance.

SECURE CRYPTO WALLET
We have been securely storing our clients' funds since 2012. Our clients' crypto funds are secured with multi-sig offline cold storage, and the euro funds are stored on a segregated custody account. Our employees follow the strictest security guidelines, and we recommend you use secure passwords with two-factor authentication.

FINANCIALLY REGULATED
Coinmotion Oy is a registered virtual currency service provider and licensed payment institution regulated by the Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority (Ref: FIVA 36/02.02.00/2018).

SUPPORTED CRYPTOCURRENCIES
Explore and invest in a vast selection of over 200 cryptocurrencies with Coinmotion. Some of our popular offerings include:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP (XRP), Stellar (XLM), AAVE (AAVE), Chainlink (LINK), USD Coin (USDC), Uniswap (UNI), USDT (USDT), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Litecoin (LTC), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE), Avalanche (AVAX), Cosmos (ATOM), Tron (TRX), Polkadot (DOT), Quant (QNT), Algorand (ALGO), Maker (MKR), NEAR Protocol (NEAR), Aptos (APT), Stacks (STX), Sui (SUI).

WEALTH MANAGEMENT
• We reward our most loyal clients with:
• Dedicated Wealth Advisors
• Discounted fees
• Exclusive market insights and reports
• Comprehensive tax and balance reporting
• OTC trading of hundreds of additional tokens

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you need help, contact our customer service at info@coinmotion.com or call +358 600 30088. More information at https://helpcenter.coinmotion.com

JOIN US & INVEST WITH CONFIDENCE
Start growing your wealth in crypto today. Download Coinmotion now.
